CustomField.formula:
IF($Organization.Id = '00D3H0000000ivA',"https://aspect.co.uk","https://aspect.co.uk.hyv.gotest.it")&
"/contact-via-email/?id="&Id&
"&acc="& Id &
"&con="& contact_bill_payer__c &
"&fn="&SUBSTITUTE( First_Name__c , " ", "%20") & "&ln="&SUBSTITUTE( Last_Name__c , " ", "%20") &
"&ema="& Email__c &
"&pho="& SUBSTITUTE(Phone," ","")
CustomField.label: Contact Via Email URL
